original_title: Tribute to the Kings: Julio César Chávez Jr. vs Anderson Silva
overview: Tribute to the Kings is a special night in honour of the first-family of Mexican boxing - Julio Cesar Chavez Sr., Julio Cesar Chavez Jr. and Omar Chavez. Three of them will take part in boxing bouts.
title: Tribute to the Kings: Julio César Chávez Jr. vs Anderson Silva
